elements.label: Kevin
elements.description: He works in the lobby. He looks like a friendly fellow.

elements.label: The Book of Dreams
elements.description: This book is said to make your dreams come true. Is that what you want? Are you prepared for the consequences?

elements.label: Dust covered Corridor
elements.description: The pamphlet led you here. It looks just like any other corridor in this place, but the pamphlet seems to consider it important.

elements.label: Library Pamphlet
elements.description: A pamphlet giving a presentation on the Library. There's a map on its flipside.

elements.label: Scrawled directions
elements.description: A handwritten map guiding you to The Library.

elements.label: Visio Tundali
elements.description: The Latin translation of an old Irish account of the castigated Titan Acheron, as witnessed by the lad Tundale in 13th century Cork.

elements.label: The Etruscan Book of Domesday
elements.description: An book passed from from the Etruscan kingdoms teaching the art of divination. Not to be confused with the Etruscans' Acherontic books.

elements.label: Zallingers Book of Mirrors
elements.description: Father Zallingers' book describes the Yellow Emperor's battle against the mirror people, who were ultimately banished and forced to imitate all who looked at them.

elements.label: Lit Candle
elements.description: A burning candle spreading a dim light. You can use it to explore dark places.

elements.label: Unlit Candle
elements.description: It's a candlestick. It does not do much good in its current, non-burning state

elements.label: Centre Hall
elements.description: A round area under huge doume siling. The walls ar filld withe bocks and in the midel are meny reding tabels blaised.

elements.label: Directions to Centre Hall
elements.description: thay hav told me about the Centre Hall. This will led me ther.
